text:
Sorry about that,
for taking your time.

It's okay.
If it's for Sakuya's sake, it's a happy thing.

Hehe... You know...
Today, there's something I want to tell you.

Producer,
thank you for meeting me.

...No, thank you.
But isn't this rather sudden?

It's something I've been thinking about for a while.
I've been wanting to say it out loud.

Thanks to meeting you,
I'm now able to walk the path of an idol.

I can connect with many people
and live within those connections.

But that's not all... I've also found
irreplaceable friends.

...I'm also really grateful to have met you, Sakuya,
to become an idol... I truly appreciate it.

So, I want to cherish this bond...
I want to continue walking together from now on.

Ah, I'm glad, Producer...
Will you continue to walk with me from now on...?
